post:
New Rage4 DNS promo for regular users (Rage4 Partner promo is available [here](http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/7522/rage4-dns-rage4-partner-promo))

**Promo only for LET members!**

**Move your domains to Rage4 DNS and get additional 100000 free requests per month per domain (350000 free requests total).
For domains generating more than 5000000 requests per month you can get additional 5% discount.**

Rage4 DNS gives you:
- fast, dual-stack, anycast network with points of presence on all continents except Antarctica,
- free GeoDNS,
- free failover support (integration with UptimeRobot, ScaleXtreme, NewRelic and NodePing)

Rage4 DNS is trusted by such reputable providers like Prometeus, Castlegem and many more

Join us now at http://rage4.com

Notes: 
- promo valid only for domains first time added to our system,
- PM me or send a mail to office [ at ] gbshouse.com so we can upgrade your free usage,
- promo valid only for domains added on 2013-01-27 or later
